PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-02152007-02-22,  ,  ,  ND, 
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAmendments to the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES which would exempt serving members of the RCMP who enrol in the Reserve Forces from regular military training exercises and from active military duty at the same time as they are required to perform their duties as police officers (Article 9.04).
AttachmentsAttachment
